articles.author: Bob Yirka
articles.title: Current bird flu epidemic found to have originated in Europe and Africa - Phys.org
articles.description: An international team of biologists, public health specialists and infectious disease experts reports that the current near-global bird flu epidemic has its roots in Europe and Africa. In their study, published in the journal Nature, the group analyzed bird f…
